name: SIDDHARTHA DWIVEDI

full_output.summary: Highly motivated and enthusiastic B.Tech student specializing in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning with hands-on experience in full-stack development, machine learning algorithms, and data analytics. Proven ability to design and implement software solutions with a focus on Python and web development technologies. Strong problem-solving skills demonstrated through internships and personal projects. Passionate about learning and leveraging technology to solve real-world challenges.

education.school: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

projects.name: Breast Cancer Prediction Model
projects.description: Developed a predictive model to classify breast cancer as benign or malignant using Python and machine learning algorithms (Logistic Regression, KNN, SVM). Applied data preprocessing techniques like feature scaling and PCA to enhance model accuracy. Achieved over 95% accuracy, showcasing strong data analysis and machine learning skills.

projects.name: Login Form and Registration
projects.description: Developed a dynamic login and registration system with user authentication and database connectivity using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and MySQL.

projects.name: Count Number of Faces Using Computer Vision
projects.description: Built a real-time face detection application using Python and OpenCV.

projects.name: Movie Recommendation System
projects.description: Developed a recommendation engine to suggest movies based on user preferences using collaborative filtering.
